name: Mummy See, Mummy Do
description:
Mummy sees.. so mummy does! Maybe the mummies have had a big night out, leave instructions for them to get home for some rest. A puzzle-platformer developed for Godot Wild Jam #42 ("Ancient" theme).

Controls

  • WASD/arrows - move & jump
  • space/z/m - attack
  • jump + down - stomp
  • R - restart
  • alt+enter - toggle fullscreen
  • escape - pause

Credits

  • gfx - https://opengameart.org/content/classical-ruin-tiles-0
  • gfx - https://kronbits.itch.io/inca-game-assets 
  • gfx - https://opengameart.org/content/mummies
  • font - https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font
  • music - https://freepd.com 
  • sfx - https://www.zapsplat.com 
  • sfx - https://kenney.nl 
  • testers - llxu, jig, thebdk, wonkru, zns
